channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Streetlight failure, 6th March
item.description:
Only streetlight in the street that is not working. Outside number 46 goodmoor crescent. makes this area very dark alot of school children use this street to get to and from school, very unsafe. All lights were updated to led recently including this one that is no longer working.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Goodmoor Crescent, Churchdown, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Lots of water coming off the building site at rope of greenway lane, 5th March
item.description:
The water is flowing down greenway lane causing the grass verges to be damaged and edge of road. People are unable to walk on verges and are walking in the road
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Greenway Lane, Charlton Kings, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: No rain in 24 hours - water has increased or remained the same

item.title: Multiple potholes and worn Road surface from corner of harp hill to entrance of Birdlip road, 5th March

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Aggs Hill, Charlton Kings, Cheltenham

item.title: Road is covered in potholes and is getting worse quickly. As of now its possible to see the metal structure beneath the road surface, 5th March
item.description:
Priors road, most the way down the road atarting from the 'Y' on the mini round side of the road and potholed roads continue to the pedestrian crossing The issues been present since a couple months after it was resurfaced and is now dramatically worse than what it was
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 263, Priors Road, Lynworth, Cheltenham

item.title: Near street light/ steps outside 12, 5th March
item.description:
Outside number 12, this pot hole was repaired last Monday 26th February. It is now two pot holes but the two holes are getting closer together forming one. Cars are slowing down or swerving towards parked cars.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 3,5, Millham Road, Bishop's Cleeve
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Many unfilled potholes Hartley lane between Minataur turning in the road to the seven springs roundabout, 5th March
item.description:
As above. You sends a team of 2 people out and they fill in some but not all of the previously marked potholes. The white paint fades away by the time they come so they don't fill them all. 75 yds of this road needs resurfacing. It is beyond repair. 2 shock absorbers, 2 tyres and my car is in the garage facing another £550 for pothole damage. Hansa garage cheltenham if you wish to phone. please come and sort this mess out properly.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Hartley Lane, Coberley, Cotswold
Report on FixMyStreet
